title: Learning Design Model-Based Intervention Program for Strengthening STEM Education Instructional Design Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners perform PBL activities using personal devices, sharing project progress and feedback via collaboration tools and digital learning platforms

learning_goals: STEM-integrated lesson plans can be designed at least three times using a learning design model.
Instructional strategies reflecting existing private theories can be revised and shared through collaboration with fellow teachers.
The effectiveness of STEM lesson designs can be diagnosed and improvements derived at least twice using formative assessment tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
